backend/main.mo: Actor storing registration forms in a list with methods to submit forms, fetch all registrations, and return analytics like total count.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing a new actor state with an empty registration list.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root container and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA component handling navigation, admin credential gating, and rendering home, registration, analytics, or registration detail pages.
frontend/src/components/AdminCredentialD: Credential dialog UI for validating admin username and password with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with email and WhatsApp cards, gradient styling, and age requirement notice.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCallout.tsx: Reusable quote component displaying highlighted quoted text with author attribution.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of service cards with icons, titles, and descriptions using a predefined services list.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with smooth scrolling, mobile menu handling, and optional registration button.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseMe.tsx: Renders a grid of reasons with icons and descriptions explaining the benefits of the service.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGate.ts: Provides simple admin authentication using hardcoded usernames and password, tracking authorization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting registrations, fetching all registrations, and retrieving analytics via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for consistent app styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAnalytics.tsx: Displays an admin analytics dashboard showing total registrations with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRegistrationDeta: Displays all stored registrations with loading, error, empty, and table states using data from useGetAllRegistrations. Provides navigation back home and handles UI for admin viewing of submissions.
frontend/src/pages/WorkFromHomeRegistrat: Implements a multiâ€‘field registration form with validation, submission to backend via useSubmitRegistration, and a success confirmation screen. Manages form state, errors, and input handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and custom animations. Defines extended design tokens and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Represents project metadata, existing features, and pending admin-related feature requests for the Smart Earning Hub app. Tracks schema version, requirements, issues, and overall project state.
